  public void addExcel() {
        UploadFile file = getFile("excel");
        
        String path = file.getSaveDirectory() + file.getFileName();
        // 处理导入数据
        List<Map<Integer, String>> list = new ArrayList<Map<Integer, String>>();
        HSSFWorkbook hwb = null;
        try {
            //hwb = new HSSFWorkbook(new FileInputStream(new File(path)));
            hwb = new HSSFWorkbook(new FileInputStream(file.getFile()));
        } catch (IOException e) {
            // TODO Auto-generated catch block
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        HSSFSheet sheet = hwb.getSheetAt(0); // 获取到第一个sheet中数据
        int i, j = 0;
        for (i = 0; i < sheet.getLastRowNum() + 1; i++) {// 第二行开始取值，第一行为标题行
            HSSFRow row = sheet.getRow(i);// 获取到第i列的行数据(表格行)
            for (j = 0; j < row.getLastCellNum(); j++) {
                HSSFCell cell = row.getCell(j);// 获取到第j行的数据(单元格)
                cell.setCellType(CellType.STRING);
                System.out.println(cell.getStringCellValue());
            }
        }
    }


    <form action="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/jf/sourceController/addExcel" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">
<input type="file" name="excel" accept="application/vnd.ms-excel , application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet"/>
<input type="submit" value="提交">
</form>
